original_text: when they sin in any of these ways and realize their guilt, they must return what they have stolen or taken by extortion, or what was entrusted to them, or the lost property they found,
korean_text: 이는 죄를 범하였고 죄가 있는 자니 그 훔친 것이나 착취한 것이나 맡은 것이나 잃은 물건을 주운 것이나

sentences.original_text: when they sin in any of these ways
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이러한 방법들 중 어느 것으로 죄를 지을 때

sentences.original_text: they must return what they have stolen
or what was entrusted to them
or the lost property they found
